DataElement.preferredDefinition: The dose/amount administered during the procedure.

ReferenceDocuments.name: What was the [dose/amount] of
ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the [dose/amount] of [PRTRT] (per administration/for the procedure)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: PRDOSE; PRDOSTXT
ReferenceDocuments.description: This does not map directly to an SDTMIG variable. Numeric values map to PRDOSE in SDTM. Non-numeric values (e.g., 200-400) map to PRDOSTXT in SDTM.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: Defining this data collection field as a dose text field allows for flexibility in capturing dose entries as numbers, text or ranges. The data collected in this dose text-format field should be separated or mapped to either SDTMIG PRDOSE if numeric or PRDOSTXT if text.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDISC Aligned NCI Standard Equivalent CDE
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is to be used for CDISC aligned data collection in place of CDE 2182866 from the original NCI Standard CRF Template.
